verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> to the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%>, Go <S%G5217><s%> ye <S%G2532><s%>, and pour out <S%G1632><s%> the seven bowls <S%G5357><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> went <S%G565><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> poured out <S%G1632><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowl <S%G5357><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it became <S%G1096><s%> a noisome <S%G2556><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> grievous <S%G4190><s%> sore <S%G1668><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> the men <S%G444><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that worshipped <S%G4352><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image <S%G1504><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the second1208, 32 poured out <S%G1632><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowl <S%G5357><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it became <S%G1096><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of a dead <S%G3498><s%> man <S%G2532><s%>; and every <S%G3956><s%> living <S%G2198><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> died <S%G599><s%>, even the things that were in <S%G1722><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the third5154, 32 poured out <S%G1632><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowl <S%G5357><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the rivers <S%G4215><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1519><s%> fountains <S%G4077><s%> of the waters <S%G5204><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it became <S%G1096><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the waters <S%G5204><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, Righteous <S%G1342><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G5607><s%>, who art and <S%G2532><s%> who wast <S%G2258><s%>, 2532, 3741 thou Holy One <S%G2962><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> thou didst thus <S%G5023><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%>:

for <S%G3754><s%> they poured <S%G1632><s%> out the blood <S%G129><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> hast thou given <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to drink <S%G4095><s%>: <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I heard191, 243 the <S%G1537><s%> altar <S%G2379><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, Yea <S%G3483><s%>, O Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, the Almighty <S%G3841><s%>, true <S%G228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> are thy <S%G4675><s%> judgments <S%G2920><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the fourth5067, 32 poured out <S%G1632><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowl <S%G5357><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it <S%G2739><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> unto it <S%G846><s%> to scorch <S%G2739><s%> men <S%G444><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> men <S%G444><s%> were scorched <S%G2739><s%> with great <S%G3173><s%> heat <S%G2738><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they blasphemed <S%G987><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they repented <S%G3340><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the fifth3991, 32 poured out <S%G1632><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowl <S%G5357><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> darkened <S%G4656><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they gnawed <S%G3145><s%> their <S%G846><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%> for <S%G1537><s%> pain <S%G4192><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> they blasphemed <S%G987><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> because <S%G1537><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> pains <S%G4192><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sores <S%G1537><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they repented <S%G3340><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the sixth1623, 32 poured out <S%G1632><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowl <S%G5357><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> river <S%G4215><s%>, the river Euphrates <S%G2166><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> was dried up <S%G3583><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> might by made ready <S%G2090><s%> for the kings <S%G935><s%> that come from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G2246><s%> sunrising <S%G395><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> coming out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the dragon <S%G1404><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the beast <S%G2342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the false prophet <S%G5578><s%>, three <S%G5140><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%>, as it were <S%G3664><s%> frogs <S%G944><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> of demons <S%G1142><s%>, working <S%G4160><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%>; which go forth1607, 3739, Nehemiah7 unto <S%G1909><s%> the kings935, Genesis93, 2532 of the whole <S%G3650><s%> world <S%G3625><s%>, to gather <S%G4863><s%> them <S%G846><s%> together unto <S%G1519><s%> the war <S%G4171><s%> of the <S%G1565><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, the Almighty <S%G3841><s%>.

(Behold <S%G2400><s%>, I come <S%G2064><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a thief <S%G2812><s%>. Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he <S%G3588><s%> that watcheth <S%G1127><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> keepeth <S%G5083><s%> his <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%> he walk <S%G4043><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they see <S%G991><s%> his <S%G846><s%> shame <S%G808><s%>.)

And <S%G2532><s%> they gathered <S%G4863><s%> them <S%G846><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> which is called <S%G2564><s%> in Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> Har-Magedon <S%G717><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the seventh1442, 32 poured out <S%G1632><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowl <S%G5357><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> the air <S%G109><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there came <S%G1831><s%> forth a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> out <S%G575><s%> of the temple <S%G3485><s%>, <S%G3772><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, It is done <S%G1096><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> there were <S%G1096><s%> lightnings <S%G796><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake <S%G4578><s%>, such as <S%G3634><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> since575, 3739 there were <S%G1096><s%> men <S%G444><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, so great <S%G3173><s%> an earthquake <S%G4578><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> mighty <S%G5082><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> was divided <S%G1096><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> parts <S%G3313><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> of the nations <S%G1484><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> was remembered <S%G3415><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, to give <S%G1325><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> of the wine <S%G3631><s%> of the fierceness <S%G2372><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> island <S%G3520><s%> fled away <S%G5343><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the mountains <S%G3735><s%> were <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> found <S%G2147><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> hail <S%G5464><s%>, every stone about <S%G5613><s%> the weight of a talent <S%G5006><s%>, cometh down <S%G2597><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> men <S%G444><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> men <S%G444><s%> blasphemed <S%G987><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> because of <S%G1537><s%> the plague <S%G4127><s%> of the hail <S%G5464><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> the plague <S%G4127><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> exceeding <S%G4970><s%> great <S%G3173><s%>.
